about.title: About FBRSigns
about.subtitle: For over 15 years, we've been transforming visions into stunning visual communication solutions that help businesses stand out and succeed.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 2009 by Sarah Johnson, FBRSigns began with a simple mission: to help businesses communicate their message through exceptional visual signage. What started as a small operation has grown into a leading signage company serving clients across the region.
story.content2: Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, from embracing digital signage technologies to implementing sustainable practices. We've completed over 10,000 projects, but what we're most proud of is the lasting relationships we've built with our clients.
story.content3: Today, our team of 50+ professionals combines decades of experience with cutting-edge technology to deliver signage solutions that not only look amazing but drive real business results.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do and shape the way we work with our clients and each other.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, from design concept to final installation.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our clients' success is our success. We build lasting relationships through exceptional service.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and creative solutions to stay ahead of industry trends.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Our collaborative approach ensures every project benefits from our collective expertise.

team.subtitle: The talented professionals behind every successful project. Our team combines expertise, creativity, and dedication.

about.title: About FBR Signs
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in professional signage solutions
about.description: With over 20 years of experience in the signage industry, FBR Signs has established itself as a premier provider of custom signage solutions. We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results.
about.mission: Our mission is to help businesses communicate their brand message effectively through innovative, high-quality signage that stands the test of time.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2009 with a vision to transform visual communication, FBR Signs has grown from a small local business to a leading signage company serving clients across multiple states. Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to quality, and a passion for helping businesses stand out.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, from design concept to final installation.
